title: Focaccia
description: Make rosemary-topped focaccia the traditional way, kneading and knocking back the dough by hand.
ingredients: 1½ tsp dried yeast or 2 heaped tsp fresh yeast
500g/1lb 2oz '00' flour or strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
3 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for greasing
extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling
2 sprigs rosemary, torn into small pieces
